settings.title: Trashcan Reminder Settings
settings.description: Please note that not all cities are supported. You can check availability by providing your postal code and house number to see if it's supported. If the address isn't supported, you can always add the pattern via the manual input settings below and still be able to use the full functionalities of the app!
settings.manualonly: The data was refreshed based on the manual settings only

manualdata.title: Advanced Date Entry
manualdata.description: Via this field you can add (extra) dates. This is not recommended, but for advanced users only. The dates should be entered in the format YYYY-mm-dd.

settings.labeldescription: The values entered below are used to customize your trash experience. The values are used in the global tags available in your flows, in the widget and set in labels on cards available in advanced flows.
settings.genericlabelhelper: Variables that can be used in the global tag sentence are __time__, __type__, __plural__.
settings.timeindicatorDescription: This is used to render the examples below your label settings, to give a sneak preview of the text available through the three global labels.

debug.labeldescription: These are the current known collection dates in the app.

typenotsupported.addviasettings: No dates known for this type of trash. Add them manually via the settings page of the app.
typenotsupported.onyouraddress: This type of trash is not supported on your address.

type.PMD: The plastics, metal and drinking carton
